transcript:
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hi sir, very good afternoon.
Customer: Afternoon.
Executive: Ashutosh baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ashutosh ji IndiaMART boliye.
Executive: Ji sir, abhi sir actually customer care pe aapne call kiya tha, concern jo aapne raise kiya hai. To thoda sa mujhe iske bare mein exactly bataye, waise already mera discussion aapke staff se ho chuka hai. But still ab mai aap se detail me janna chahta hu taki mai bhi apni taraf se jo bhi chije hai usko correct kar saku aur jo bhi mera point of view hai wo rakh saku.
Customer: Dekhiye simple sa chiz hai, very simple fraud lagata hu mai aapko.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aapka jo Venkat aur Prashant hai na, they are fraud.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Thik hai? Maine ek mahine pehle IndiaMART ka subscription liya, unko payment kiya. Maximizer package liya aur unki side se tha sir aapko 10 days me one week me sara kuch live ho jayega. I thought ki humne payment kar diya, thik hai?
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Payment hone ke baad se jo unhone one second. Ah, bola ki sir aapka jo hai live kar denge hum. Bola thik hai aap live kar do. Aur live hone ke baad unhone message kiya sir live ho gaya hai. Ye baat 20 din pehle ki hai.
Executive: Thik hai, almost 14th of October ko aapke service live hui hai.
Customer: To ho gaya na 20 din?
Executive: Ha almost ha 20 din ho gaya.
Customer: 20 din ho gaya.
Customer: To, one second. Let me get to hoti thi logo ko taki mai IndiaMART open kar saku. Hmm. Just be online.
Executive: Yeah sure. Fir uske baad se jo unhone jo bhi detail diya tha wo sara detail mere catalog me pura sara kuch galat tha.
Customer: Achha.
Customer: Maine unko kaha ki ye sara detail galat hai. Unhone kaha sir nahi nahi koi baat nahi wo hota hai sir aap tension mat lo. Aap mujhe 5 minute do, hum isko hai sorry ek din ka time do. Mai mere side se ek aadmi bhejta hu, he will come. OTP bhi wo IndiaMART ke taraf se OTP kya hoga office me unke.
Customer: Ek minute sir Ashutosh ji just be online.
Executive: Yeah sure sure.
Customer: To unhone kaha sir aap thoda bhi tension mat lo. Ek se do din ke andar hum mere aadmi ko aapke side pe bhej rahe hai. Wo jayega aapka sara kuch dekh ke aa jayega sir.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: To humne kaha thik hai, koi dikkat nahi hai. Ah, bahut achhi baat hai. Uske baad se, ah, ye jis I should not say this word but this fraud Prashant isne call uthana band kar diya. Ab mai uske number pe jab bhi call karta hu, phone cut ho jata hai. Aur WhatsApp call pe jata hai phone aur WhatsApp call pe wo kabhi respond nahi karta hai. Unka number aapke paas jo hai wo mujhe bata sakte hai kya ek baar? Prashant ke against kya likha hai abhi?
Customer: Ha ha Prashant Venkat wo mai bolta hu. Venkat mere paas aaya tha pretending that he is the regional manager.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: He never after coming to my place, ek baar usne sirf text kiya ki aapka live ho gaya hai. Uske baad se from past 20 days I am trying to talk to him, usne kabhi respond nahi kara. Kabhi nahi.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: So Prashant ka number mai aapko deta hu 8096.
Executive: 8096.
Customer: 501273.
Executive: 501273. 1273.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Ah, Deshmu Prashant, right? Ah, it's direct sales plant acquisition Telangana, right?
Customer: I'll give you the number of Venkat also.
Executive: Just allow me a moment, mai inka detail note kar leta hu.
Customer: Please. Ah, bhai mujhe basically.
Executive: Yes sir please.
Executive: Ah, number bata sakte hai sir aap Venkat ka bhi?
Customer: Venkat ka number hai 880.
Executive: Ah, Venkat Krishna, right?
Customer: Yes, Venkat Krishna.
Executive: Okay, he is the business manager. Correct. He is also same level of stupid person as Prashant. Maybe the higher level. Higher level. Being on a manager position he is least bother to respond to client. Mai specifically mai Prashant ko isliye kaha tha ki mai directly sirf ek sales executive ko ye nahi dunga aap kisi manager ko leke aao so that uske baad pe kuch trust rahega and I can give the contract to you. He brought me Venkat and the same thing happened. After making the money it's been almost a month nothing is happening.
Executive: Okay. End of the day fatak ho ke I arrange your regional director Ravi Teja's email ID. Then I put a text in the group if you are not responding I'll I have to talk to Ravi Teja your regional director. Tab this Venkat and Prashant started responding.
Executive: Okay. Before that nobody was least bother, anybody was least bother to respond.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Ah, please go ahead sir.
Customer: So there is no leads coming if I'll go to the inquiries also.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: There are hardly any inquiry from Hyderabad if I'll go to buyleads and I'll location I'll put as Telangana there is no relevant leads. And if I'll go to past leads there are leads full of Telangana which is expired.
Executive: Right.
Customer: It's full with Telangana five days ago, six days ago, four days ago, three days ago. Full leads it's from Telangana.
Executive: Yes even from today also.
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: Even today also kuch leads aayi hai aaj ki date ki aayi hai.
Customer: Even for today also wo dikha raha hai sold out, verified ye mere sare relevant leads hai. Toilet container, security guard, container home sare relevant leads hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Got it. Ah, iske alawa aapne jo isme mention kiya hai ki catalog wrongly updated hai to catalog me aap mujhe bataye lead ka solution mai aapko bata dunga. Aapke hisab se jo wahi discussion chal raha tha. Abhi Google Meet par bhi connect karne ko bola tha maine unse but aapke hisab se matlab aap Google Meet se connect ho to jyada achha hoga aap aapka desk share karke mujhe explain kar sakte ho aur aap mai team ko bhi comment thi. Right right, ab maine already ek mail drop kiya hua hai just confirm ki wo mail aapko receive hua hai ki nahi mai mail ID bata deta hu. Inquiry@ receive hua hai mujhe mail receive hua hai. I tried to connect over Google Meet but I think unfortunately you were busy in something. Actually aapke staff ne bola tha mujhe ki baad me connect karenge.
Customer: Ha to aap ek kaam karo agar free ho to even connect over this. Yes mai mai abhi available hu mai join kar le raha hu within a minute. Aap please join kijiye.
Customer: Done done done let's join over Google. Okay sir. Very nice talking to you Ashutosh thank you so much. Yes thank you sir let's continue over the Google Meet. Sure.
summary:
Concerns:

- Venkat and Prashant are fraud.

- Catalog details are incorrect.

- No relevant buyleads are being received.

- Prashant and Venkat not responding after payment.



Resolution:

- Executive noted the contact numbers of Prashant, Venkat.

- Agreed to connect over Google Meet.



Next Steps: 

- Connect over Google Meet.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, subscription, fraud
